entity_type.description: The ID of the entity type that will be fired.
entity_type.markdownDescription: The ID of the entity type that will be fired.

cooldown.description: Interval of ticks this power needs to recharge before the power can be triggered again.
cooldown.markdownDescription: Interval of ticks this power needs to recharge before the power can be triggered again.

hud_render.description: Determines how the cooldown of this power is visualized on the HUD.
hud_render.markdownDescription: Determines how the cooldown of this power is visualized on the HUD.

count.description: The amount of projectiles to fire each use.
count.markdownDescription: The amount of projectiles to fire each use.

interval.description: Determines the interval for firing multiple projectiles consecutively (in ticks). If set to 0, it will fire all the projectiles at the same tick.
interval.markdownDescription: Determines the interval for firing multiple projectiles consecutively (in ticks). If set to 0, it will fire all the projectiles at the same tick.

start_delay.description: Determines how long the start of the firing process is delayed (in ticks).
start_delay.markdownDescription: Determines how long the start of the firing process is delayed (in ticks).

speed.description: The speed applied to the fired projectile.
speed.markdownDescription: The speed applied to the fired projectile.

divergence.description: How much each projectile fired is affected by random spread.
divergence.markdownDescription: How much each projectile fired is affected by random spread.

sound.description: If set, the sound with this ID will be played when the power is used.
sound.markdownDescription: If set, the sound with this ID will be played when the power is used.

key.description: Which active key this power should respond to. If none is specified, this power will use the primary active power key (by default G).
key.markdownDescription: Which active key this power should respond to. If none is specified, this power will use the primary active power key (by default G).

projectile_action.description: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the projectile or entity that will be launched.
projectile_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the projectile or entity that will be launched.

shooter_action.description: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the entity that has the power.
shooter_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the entity that has the power.

type.description:
## Fire Projectile --- [Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/fire_projectile) Fires one or more projectiles upon pressing the specified [Key](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/fire_projectile). Type ID: `origins:fire_projectile` --- ### Examples ```json { "type": "origins:fire_projectile", "entity_type": "minecraft:arrow", "cooldown": 2, "hud_render": { "should_render": false }, "tag": "{pickup:0b}", "key": { "key": "key.attack", "continuous": true } } ``` This example will let the player fire arrows very rapidly by holding the left mouse button. They can't be picked up.
```json { "type": "origins:fire_projectile", "entity_type": "minecraft:snowball", "cooldown": 100, "hud_render": { "should_render": false }, "count": 4, "interval": 5, "tag": "{Item: {id: 'minecraft:slime_ball', Count: 1b}}", "key": { "key": "key.use", "continuous": false } } ``` This example will let the player fire 4 snow balls disguised as slime balls consecutively, with an interval of 5 ticks upon pressing the right mouse button.
type.markdownDescription:
undefined## Fire Projectile --- [Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/fire_projectile) Fires one or more projectiles upon pressing the specified [Key](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/fire_projectile). Type ID: `origins:fire_projectile` --- ### Examples ```json { "type": "origins:fire_projectile", "entity_type": "minecraft:arrow", "cooldown": 2, "hud_render": { "should_render": false }, "tag": "{pickup:0b}", "key": { "key": "key.attack", "continuous": true } } ``` This example will let the player fire arrows very rapidly by holding the left mouse button. They can't be picked up.
```json { "type": "origins:fire_projectile", "entity_type": "minecraft:snowball", "cooldown": 100, "hud_render": { "should_render": false }, "count": 4, "interval": 5, "tag": "{Item: {id: 'minecraft:slime_ball', Count: 1b}}", "key": { "key": "key.use", "continuous": false } } ``` This example will let the player fire 4 snow balls disguised as slime balls consecutively, with an interval of 5 ticks upon pressing the right mouse button.
